translations: n．承诺，保证：表示将会履行某一义务或行为的正式承诺。
· The government made pledges to improve the environment.
v．发誓，保证：正式承诺将会履行某一义务或行为。

sentences.sentence: The fighting made a nonsense of peace pledges made last week.
sentences.translation: 这场战斗使上周做出的和平承诺失去了意义。

sentences.sentence: Philip pledges support and offers to help in any way that he can.
sentences.translation: 菲利普承诺给予支持并提供力所能及的帮助。

sentences.sentence: He had dishonoured nearly all of his election pledges.
sentences.translation: 他几乎违背了所有的竞选诺言。
